school.name: Faculty of Engineering, Ain-Shams University, Cairo, Egypt

projects.title: Desig light-truck frame
projects.description: Design, Fabricate and Application for a Light-truck frame. The Frame has been tested theoretically on Single element aided design program soft ware [SAP].

profile_positions.description:
•Managing workshop in 6 different branches covers the whole country.
•Technically guiding 3 engineers on 4 different zones, 30 technicians in diagnosis and driving problems.
•Supervising the major repairs at the brand agents (7 agents) in Egypt.
•Auditing the vehicles after major repair before receiving it from workshop.
•Controlling budget for repair fleet of 103 vehicle spending roughly 4-6 M /year.
•Following up the warranty for the vehicles and for the repair. 
•Reporting the fleet state weekly / monthly / yearly and putting plan for refurbishing and replacing the fleet adjacent to the budget to do it.
•Reporting comparison between different brand vehicle models for the decision of replacement estimating lifetime, running cost, reliability, parts availability, after sales effectiveness, training the technicians on the new technologies.
profile_positions.title: Engineering Dept. Manager

profile_positions.description:
•Managing workshop section for vehicles, motor-bikes and body-shop repair.
•Technically guiding technicians in the electrical diagnosis and drivability problems.
•Preparing estimates for major repairs (mechanical and body-shop).
•Carrying out end control checks and road testing the vehicles before delivery, to ensure ultimate delivery status.
•Increased monthly labor sales from 100'000 to 210’000 LE. 
•Reporting malfunction of parts and causes of failure for all warranty claims.
•Reporting new findings and technical problems to the regional technical assistant.
profile_positions.title: Branch Manager Assistant

profile_positions.description:
•Managing the work flow for a 70 technicians-workshop consisting of mechanic shop, electric shop, PDI, units overhauling.
•Diagnosing problems and directing technicians to solve customer complaints.
•Updating service manuals, campaigns and electronic service information “SI”
•Arranging training for team leaders and technicians for new models and systems.
•Preparing warranty claims reports.
•Evaluating the performance of technicians and reporting to higher management.
•Contacting area technical assistance centers for unique technical issues.
profile_positions.title: Workshop Supervisor

profile_positions.description:
•Dealing with customers, specifying and understanding complaints and describe it in the repair order.
•Discuss estimates and invoices and negotiate about the prices.
•Negotiate with insurance companies' representatives for accident repairs
profile_positions.title: Reception Section Head

profile_positions.description:
•Leading the work flow for a 20 technicians-workshop consisting of mechanic shop, electric shop.
•Diagnosing problems and directing technicians to solve customer complaints.
•Updating service manuals, campaigns and electronic service information “SI”
•Participating training for team leaders and technicians for new systems.
•Preparing warranty claims reports.
•Evaluating the new branch on Sharm El-Sheikh to higher management.
•Contacting area technical assistance centers for unique technical issues.
profile_positions.title: Service Advisor

profile_positions.description:
•Leading mobile technical team to service Mercedes-Benz commercial fleets (buses, light-duty and heavy-duty trucks) at their locations.
•Supporting clients with mobile service all over the country (Egypt).
•Providing technical assistance and advice to ensure best fleets operation.
•Technically studying each fleet operating conditions and owner maintenance facilities to solve common problems, as each fleet works in special environment.
•Establishing good communications between company and clients’ service department to solve any problem and reach their satisfaction.
profile_positions.title: Service Representative
